title: What Doctors Do to Boost Their Immune Systems
author: Jon Cooper
description: How can you make your immune system stronger? Why not try what the pros try?
cleaned_text: What Doctors Do to Boost Their Immune Systems Meet Our Expert 1/10 Get Enough Sleep 2/10 Have a Sleep Routine 3/10 Be Active 4/10 Find Your Special Place 5/10 Be Mindful 6/10 Eat Right 7/10 Go With Natural Sources 8/10 Stay Up to Date on Vaccines
